leftItems.title: Do you offer international group departures?
leftItems.content: Yes, we operate curated group departures across India and international destinations.

leftItems.title: Are your spiritual or psychedelic retreats legal?
leftItems.content: Yes. Such experiences are offered only in destinations where they are legal and regulated.

leftItems.title: Can I customize a trip?
leftItems.content: Absolutely. We design personalized itineraries for individual travelers and private groups.

rightItems.title: Do you cater to foreign travelers?
rightItems.content: Yes, we serve both Indian and international clients.

rightItems.title: Is travel insurance required?
rightItems.content: Strongly recommended, especially for international and adventure travel.
